alert.note: Alert for Limestone; Madison; Morgan (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:22PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Madison, southeastern Limestone and central Morgan Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 421 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Decatur, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Decatur, Hartselle, Redstone Arsenal, Priceville, Triana, Marshall Space Flight Center, Huntsville International Airport, Somerville, Mooresville and Valhermoso Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
